about_the_game:
Dungeons & Vampires is a fascinating and hardcore roguelike, in which you have to fight with the terrible creatures of darkness in procedurally generated dungeons in search for treasures, adventures, and glory.

In the role of a brave undead hunter, you have to make your way through the hordes of creatures of darkness, in order to drive aspen stakes into the long-cooled hearts of their masters - the ancient vampires! The bloodsuckers from the depths of the earthly firm have terrorized the surface for centuries, and there was no one who dared to challenge them. But that was before you came along.

Use unique character skills to stay alive! Dungeons & Vampires will offer you 4 game classes that have their own characteristics, increasing as they are pumped (Knight, Cleric, Witchdoctor, Rogue). You are free to develop one or all of the available classes at once.



  • A fascinating alloy of RPG and Dungeon Crawler elements, clicker-mechanic and Roguelike games.
  • Procedurally generated levels.
  • 4 main classes, dozens of enemies and items.
  • Random events, determined before the beginning of each game and modifying the gameplay.
  • Daily awards, quests for the time and 40+ achievements.
  • There are no lootboxes or microtransactions. All crystall you can give in game.
  • Fascinating mini-games, built into the main gameplay.
  • 10 hours of play? Ha! How about 10 million hours ?! You can (and will) play Dungeons & Vampires for the rest of your life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP SP3
  • Processor: Intel Atom 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Dungeons & Vampires- addictive step-by-step role-playing role-playing Roguelike-game with a gothic atmosphere, combining Dungeon Crawler and Clicker mechanics. Teach your hunters to vampires, clearing the way through dangerous procedurally-generated dungeons.
